data.message:
Im only bein real when I say nobody wants to hear their grandfather rap
Old men have heart attacks
and I dont want to be responsible for that so
Put the mic down and walk away
You can still have a little bit of dignity.  Fucking sellout

replies.message: Someone has got their feelings hurt 😭❄️😭❄️😭❄️,,,,, oh , sell out????? You obviously were NEVER fan to begin with 🤗
Another liberal fuck ^^^^
He told you to fuck off already. What are you still doing here?
Sounds like you're the one pissed off. Buy all publicity is good publicity, so please go ahead and continue whining. Eminem thanks you for the free publicity and money.
Good comeback!
He needs all the publicity he can get🤣🤣🤣
Yeah, and he thanks you for it. Now go beg your president to grab you by the pussy.
Yup so sad. A junky abusive asswipe with mommy issues told me to fuck off.  Whatever shall I do?
Cindy Joyce Douglas you know there are countries outside the US right?
Justin Goyette you come here and comment on his posts to help him out with publicity of course! What else?
Cindy Joyce Douglas I mean I don't live in the US... so no, he's not my president.
Cindy Joyce Douglas don't pay him any attention, love. Check his profile, he's a troll. David Svantesson em is a closet queer. End of story.
Cindy Joyce Douglas I still listen to music you know.. you Trump supporters do realise people from other countries listens to music right?
Justin Goyette smooth putting the "love" in there.
Don't worry David Svantesson I love you too you sexy devil
Justin Goyette <3
I love to hear a em song....always will..#goat
You wouldn't be saying this if a rapper dissed Obama Tho... and how's he a sell out for dissing trump? Or did you forget when he ripped Bush a new one?

Xander Martinez he wouldn't have the balls to rip Obama. Or he would have.  I listen to this weak ass temper tantrum by a has been. Em lost it. He's not paying attention at all. Trump has done more for people in his life then some junky retard like Marshall. He must be back on coke or something. I have had it out with many of these shit throwing monkeys. See these celebrities don't understand they are here for OUR entertainment. It's just that simple.  They are equal to zoo animals or circus performers.  I have been blocked by a ton of these self righteous idiots. Like Ron Perlman, Michael Chiklis, Torrey Devito to name a few. They can't handle the truth. Trump did what they do because he was bored.
No Kevin Tank Barlow not at all just telling the truth.  These so called celebrities forget their place. They are no better than monkeys with cymbals
All these jiggboos talking crap to a girl.
David Svantesson Then shut the fuck up, asshole!  Your opinion means less than nothing here in the US altho you sure can't stop running your ignorant mouth.
